document.full_text: a suicide bomber drove an explosives-packed car into a police station on wednesday as the taliban intensified attacks against pakistan's security forces after the killing of al qaeda's osama bin laden.
document.title: car bomb destroys police station in pakistan, 6 dead
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber drove an explosives-packed car into a police station on wednesday as the taliban intensified attacks against pakistan's security forces after the killing of al qaeda's osama bin laden.
